Three publicly accessible warming centers will be open in Lewisville, starting Friday, Jan. 23, from 9 a.m. through 8 p.m., Monday, Jan. 26, depending on location. Use this link for additional information on the warming centers and other weather related updates.

City Hall

City Leadership Team

Font Size: + -
Share & Bookmark Share & Bookmark, Press Enter to show all options, press Tab go to next option
  • Email
  • Facebook
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Reddit
Feedback Print
Lewisville City Council establishes policy and goals for the city, then hires professional staff to carry out those policies and achieve those goals. The City Council directly appoints four positions, and all other employees are hired and supervised by or under the authority of those positions. The top administrator for the city is the City Manager, who oversee more than 900 city employees.

  • Claire Powell

    City Manager

Some administrative authority is assigned to other appointed positions, including the City Secretary and the Municipal Judge.

  • Jennifer Malone-Ippolito

    City Secretary

  • Brian Holman

    Municipal Judge

Lewisville has one Deputy City Manager and two Assistant City Managers, who form the Senior Management Team along with the City Manager. City operations are further divided into 14 departments. The directors of those departments (shown below) handle day-to-day activities and report to the Senior Management Team. The entire city leadership team meets an average of once a week to coordinate the activities of all departments for the betterment of the city.

  • Gina McGrath

    Deputy City Manager

  • Shante Akafia

    Assistant City Manager

  • James Proce

    Assistant City Manager

  • Stacia Anaya

    Parks and Recreation

  • Carolyn Booker

    Library Services

  • Brook Rollins

    Police Chief

  • Dave Erb

    Financial Services

  • James Kunke

    Community Engagement

  • Chris Lee

    Information Technology Services

  • Jeremy Leonard

    Municipal Court

  • Richard Luedke

    Planning

  • Chris McGinn

    Neighborhood & Inspection Services

  • Mark McNeal

    Fire Chief

  • Tadd Phillips

    Human Resources

  • Aaron Russell

    Public Services

  • Marichelle Samples

    Economic Development and Tourism

  • David Salmon

    Engineering
